Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh began their campaign in style, bowling Afghanistan out for 156 before chasing down the score in quick time. However, they then slipped to consecutive defeats against England and New Zealand before losing their most recent fixture to India in Pune.

South Africa also started strongly, beating Sri Lanka by 102 runs after scoring a World Cup-record 428/5. They then thrashed Australia before suffering a shock loss to Netherlands. The Proteas got back to winning ways in their latest match, beating defending champions England by 229 runs in Mumbai.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The free live streaming for the ODI World Cup 2023 match between Bangladesh and South Africa will be available on Disney+ Hotstar.
The match will start at 14:00 PM IST at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
The ongoing ICC World Cup 2023 will be available on your mobiles too. The match between Bangladesh and South Africa will now be live-streamed for absolutely free.
The Live Streaming will be available on the Dinsey+Hotstar app.
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ongoing ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
